nz.org.venice.prefs.settings
Class GraphSettings

java.lang.Object
  nz.org.venice.prefs.settings.AbstractSettings
      nz.org.venice.prefs.settings.GraphSettings
All Implemented Interfaces:
Settings
public class GraphSettings
extends AbstractSettings

This class represents Graph data which can be saved for the purposes of restoring the modules upon restart.

Author:
Mark Hummel
See Also:
PreferencesManager
